channel.title: Need Help whit runserver/runbat
channel.description: when i open up runbat it opens and the closes =/ help?

item.title: Need Help whit runserver/runbat
item.dc:creator: @mydr3am mydr3am
item.description:
@mydr3am wrote:

[quote=“Yuxus, post:5, topic:147849”]Right Click Runserver.bat and press edit, delete everything and replace it with this this it makes any server work for me:@echo off title Runserver set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause
And Do the same with compiler but add this instead:@echo off title Compiler "%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
Hope This Helps! ;D[/quote]

Thanx helped me alot!

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help whit runserver/runbat
item.dc:creator: @Yuxus Yuxus
item.description:
@Yuxus wrote:

Right Click Runserver.bat and press edit, delete everything and replace it with this this it makes any server work for me:@echo off title Runserver set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause
And Do the same with compiler but add this instead:@echo off title Compiler "%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
Hope This Helps! ;D

Read full topic
